languages.text: Наносит <u>(от 14 до 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g} всем противникам на соседних с Кхимерой клетках и дает Кхимере +30 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.
Deals <u>(from 14 to 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to all enemies adjacent to the Khymera and grants the Khymera +30 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Наносит <u>(от 14 до 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g} всем противникам на соседних с Кхимерой клетках и дает Кхимере +30 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Deals 20-32 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to all enemies adjacent to Khymerae and grants Khymerae +30 temporary wounds.
Deals <u>(from 14 to 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to all enemies adjacent to the Khymera and grants the Khymera +30 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

Deals <u>(from 14 to 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to all enemies adjacent to the Khymera and grants the Khymera +30 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

languages.text: カイメラに隣接するすべての敵に<u>14～21</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を与え、カイメラに+30の一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}傷{/g}を授ける。
languages.original_text: Deals <u>(from 14 to 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to all enemies adjacent to the Khymera and grants the Khymera +30 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: カイメラに隣接するすべての敵に20～32の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を与え、カイメラに30の一時的な傷を与える。

languages.text: 对柯美拉附近所有敌人造成<u>14-21</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}，柯美拉获得30点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: Deals <u>(from 14 to 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to all enemies adjacent to the Khymera and grants the Khymera +30 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 对柯美拉附近所有敌人造成<u>14-21</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}，柯美拉获得30点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。

languages.text: Inflige <u>(de 14 a 21)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} a todos los enemigos adyacentes a las kymera y le concede +30 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Inflige 20-32 de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} a todos los enemigos adyacentes a las kymeras y les concede +30 heridas temporales.

languages.text: Verursacht <u>(14 bis 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g} bei allen an die Khymäre angrenzenden Feinden und gewährt der Khymäre +30 temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Wunden{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Verursacht 20-32 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g} bei allen an die Khymäre angrenzenden Feinden und gewährt der Khymäre +30 temporäre Wunden.

languages.text: Inflige <u>(de 14 à 21)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g} à tous les ennemis adjacents au kyméraée et lui confère +30 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures{/g} temporaires.

languages.text: Kimera'nın bitişiğinde bulunan tüm düşmanlara <u>(14 ila 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasar{/g} verir ve Kimera'ya +30 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazandırır.
